verses.verse: <S%H1732>David<s%> therefore <S%H3212>departed<s%> <S%H4422>there,<s%> and escaped to the <S%H4631>cave<s%> of <S%H5725>Adullam.<s%> When his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and all his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H3381>it,<s%> they went down there to him.

<S%H376>Everyone<s%> who was in <S%H4689>distress,<s%> and <S%H376>everyone<s%> who was in <S%H5378>debt,<s%> and <S%H376>everyone<s%> who was <S%H4751>discontented,<s%> <S%H6908>gathered<s%> themselves to <S%H8269>him;<s%> and he became captain over <S%H702>them:<s%> and there were with him about four <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> there to <S%H4708>Mizpeh<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> "Please let my <S%H1>father<s%> and my <S%H517>mother<s%> come <S%H3318>out<s%> with <S%H3045>you,<s%> until I know what <S%H430>God<s%> will do for <S%H6213>me.<s%>"

He <S%H5148>brought<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab;<s%> and they <S%H3427>lived<s%> with him all the <S%H3117>while<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was in the <S%H4686>stronghold.<s%>

The <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1410>Gad<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H3427>"Don't<s%> stay in the <S%H4686>stronghold.<s%> <S%H3212>Depart,<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>" Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3212>departed,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H3293>forest<s%> of <S%H2802>Hereth.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> that <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H3045>discovered,<s%> and the <S%H582>men<s%> who were with <S%H7586>him.<s%> Now Saul was <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in <S%H1390>Gibeah,<s%> under the tamarisk <S%H815>tree<s%> in <S%H7414>Ramah,<s%> with his <S%H2595>spear<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and all his <S%H5650>servants<s%> were standing about <S%H5324>him.<s%>

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants<s%> who <S%H5324>stood<s%> about <S%H8085>him,<s%> "Hear now, you <S%H1145>Benjamites!<s%> Will the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H5414>give<s%> everyone of you <S%H7704>fields<s%> and <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> will he <S%H7760>make<s%> you all <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H505>thousands<s%> and <S%H8269>captains<s%> of <S%H3967>hundreds,<s%>

that all of you have <S%H7194>conspired<s%> against <S%H1540>me,<s%> and there is none who discloses to me when my <S%H1121>son<s%> makes a <S%H3772>treaty<s%> with the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> and there is none of you who is <S%H2470>sorry<s%> for <S%H1540>me,<s%> or discloses to me that my <S%H1121>son<s%> has stirred <S%H6965>up<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> against <S%H693>me,<s%> to lie in wait, as at this <S%H3117>day?<s%>"

Then <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite,<s%> who <S%H5324>stood<s%> by the <S%H5650>servants<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul,<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3448>Jesse<s%> <S%H935>coming<s%> to <S%H5011>Nob,<s%> to <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub.<s%>

He <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> for <S%H5414>him,<s%> gave him <S%H6720>food,<s%> and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him the <S%H2719>sword<s%> of <S%H1555>Goliath<s%> the <S%H6430>Philistine.<s%>"

Then the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> and all his <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> who were in <S%H5011>Nob:<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> all of them to the <S%H4428>king.<s%>
<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H8085>"Hear<s%> <S%H1121>now,<s%> you son of <S%H285>Ahitub.<s%>" He <S%H559>answered,<s%> "Here I <S%H113>am,<s%> my lord."

<S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H7194>him,<s%> "Why have you conspired against <S%H1121>me,<s%> you and the son of <S%H3448>Jesse,<s%> in that you have <S%H5414>given<s%> him <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and a <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and have <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H6965>him,<s%> that he should rise against <S%H693>me,<s%> to lie in wait, as at this <S%H3117>day?<s%>"

Then <S%H288>Ahimelech<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> the <S%H4428>king,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "Who among all your <S%H5650>servants<s%> is so <S%H539>faithful<s%> as <S%H1732>David,<s%> who is the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2860>son-in<s%>-law, and is <S%H5493>taken<s%> into your <S%H4928>council,<s%> and is <S%H3513>honorable<s%> in your <S%H1004>house?<s%>

Have I <S%H3117>today<s%> <S%H2490>begun<s%> to <S%H7592>inquire<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> for <S%H2486>him?<s%> Be it far from me! <S%H4428>Don't<s%> let the king <S%H7760>impute<s%> <S%H1697>anything<s%> to his <S%H5650>servant,<s%> nor to all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of my <S%H1>father;<s%> for your <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> <S%H1697>nothing<s%> of all <S%H6996>this,<s%> less or <S%H1419>more.<s%>"
The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "You shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H288>Ahimelech,<s%> <S%H1>you,<s%> and all your father's <S%H1004>house.<s%>"

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H7323>guard<s%> who <S%H5324>stood<s%> about <S%H5437>him,<s%> "Turn, and <S%H4191>kill<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh;<s%> because their <S%H3027>hand<s%> also is with <S%H1732>David,<s%> and because they <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he <S%H1272>fled,<s%> and <S%H1540>didn't<s%> disclose it to <S%H5650>me.<s%>" But the servants of the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H14>wouldn't<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H6293>fall<s%> on the <S%H3548>priests<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

The <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1673>Doeg,<s%> <S%H5437>"Turn<s%> and <S%H6293>attack<s%> the <S%H3548>priests!<s%>" <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite<s%> <S%H5437>turned,<s%> and he <S%H6293>attacked<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and he <S%H4191>killed<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H8084>eighty<s%> - <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H376>people<s%> who <S%H5375>wore<s%> a <S%H906>linen<s%> <S%H646>ephod.<s%>

He <S%H5221>struck<s%> <S%H5011>Nob,<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword,<s%> both <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H5768>children<s%> and <S%H3243>nursing<s%> <S%H7794>babies,<s%> and cattle and <S%H2543>donkeys<s%> and <S%H7716>sheep,<s%> with the <S%H6310>edge<s%> of the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

<S%H259>One<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H288>Ahimelech,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H285>Ahitub,<s%> <S%H8034>named<s%> <S%H54>Abiathar,<s%> <S%H4422>escaped,<s%> and <S%H1272>fled<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%>
<S%H54>Abiathar<s%> <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> that <S%H7586>Saul<s%> had <S%H2026>slain<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H3548>priests.<s%>

<S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H54>Abiathar,<s%> "I <S%H3045>knew<s%> on that <S%H3117>day,<s%> when <S%H1673>Doeg<s%> the <S%H130>Edomite<s%> was <S%H5046>there,<s%> that he would surely <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H7586>Saul.<s%> I am <S%H5437>responsible<s%> for the death of all the <S%H5315>persons<s%> of your <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house.<s%>

<S%H3427>Stay<s%> with <S%H3372>me,<s%> don't be afraid; for he who <S%H1245>seeks<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%> <S%H1245>seeks<s%> your <S%H5315>life.<s%> For with me you shall be in <S%H4931>safeguard.<s%>"
